title: This 83-Year-Old Can Beat You—and Maybe Stephen Curry—at Free Throws
sub_head: A Texas tax attorney stays fit by shooting at least 150 free throws, six days a week
body:
Jim Ullrich is 83 years old, but he thinks he can beat Stephen Curry in a shootout.
Mr. Ullrich lobs at least 150 free throws six days a week and usually gets nothing but net. And he hustles to retrieve the ball after each shot.
